folder.name: Scripts NeoBank P3_M5 - Step2 da POC

content.query:
--Acessando o SA por https

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DS_NEOBANKbronze
WITH (
	LOCATION = 'https://saneobank.blob.core.windows.net/bronze',
	CREDENTIAL = CredentialsDataLake
)


--Acessando por ABFS

/*
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DS_NEOBANKbronze_abfs
WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'abfss://bronze@saneobank.dfs.core.windows.net/', 
    CREDENTIAL = CredentialsDataLake
    
  ) ;
GO
*/
